title: Elementary Language Education Design Practice Through Online Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience with online tools
context.additional_context: Process where learners (job seekers/in-service teachers) use online collaboration tools to share collective knowledge and perform practical projects for designing elementary language education

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively create three or more language education design models using online learning design tools
Learners can identify at least two problems that arise when designing education considering cultural differences and propose solutions.
Learners can revise instructional designs by incorporating peer feedback based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
